ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 204
ygData.msgSnippet: Subject: RE: Your kidding me Flashbacks are caused by a brain hemorrhage, which is caused by bad LSD...the rat
ygData.messageBody:
<< From: "Richard Slater" <opium@...>
Subject: RE: Your kidding me
Flashbacks are caused by a brain hemorrhage, which is caused by bad
LSD...the rat poison or other harmful type. I didn't say all LSD had no
side effects, I said morning glory LSD (much like paode) had no permanent
damages.>>

Your wrong. Without going into credentials here...look it up or call my
office..i'll explain the process of how it is stored in the fatty tissues of
the body. Brain hemorrages have absolutely nothing to do with a flash
back...unless you are speaking of a possible symptomatic response.
